verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ב <WH7901> slept אֲבִיָּ֜ה <WH29> So Abijah עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתָ֗יו <WH1> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <WH6912> and they buried אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בְּעִ֣יר <WH5892> him in the city דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אָסָ֥א <WH609> and Asa בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> his son תַּחְתָּ֑יו <WH8478> his place בְּיָמָ֛יו <WH3117> in his stead In his days שָׁקְטָ֥ה <WH8252> was quiet הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land עֶ֥שֶׂר <WH6235> ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years פ

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> did אָסָא֙ <WH609> And Asa הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> [that which was] good וְהַיָּשָׁ֔ר <WH3477> and right בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the eyes יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> his God

וַיָּ֛סַר <WH5493> For he took away אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּח֥וֹת <WH4196> the altars הַנֵּכָ֖ר <WH5236> of the strange וְהַבָּמ֑וֹת <WH1116> [gods] and the high places וַיְשַׁבֵּר֙ <WH7665> and brake down אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּצֵּב֔וֹת <WH4676> the images וַיְגַדַּ֖ע <WH1438> and cut down אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲשֵׁרִֽים׃ <WH842> the groves

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And commanded לִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah לִדְר֕וֹשׁ <WH1875> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> and to do הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> the law וְהַמִּצְוָֽה׃ <WH4687> and the commandment

וַיָּ֙סַר֙ <WH5493> Also he took away מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> the high places וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחַמָּנִ֑ים <WH2553> and the images וַתִּשְׁקֹ֥ט <WH8252> was quiet הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> and the kingdom לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וַיִּ֛בֶן <WH1129> And he built עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities מְצוּרָ֖ה <WH4694> fenced בִּיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> in Judah כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since שָׁקְטָ֣ה <WH8252> had rest הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> for the land וְאֵין־ <WH369> and there עִמּ֤וֹ <WH5973> at מִלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> and he had no war בַּשָּׁנִ֣ים <WH8141> in those years הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> those כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because הֵנִ֥יחַ <WH5117> had given him rest יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD לֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Therefore he said לִֽיהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> unto Judah נִבְנֶ֣ה ׀ <WH1129> Let us build אֶת־ <WH853> הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> these cities הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וְנָסֵ֨ב <WH5437> and make about חוֹמָ֣ה <WH2346> [them] walls וּמִגְדָּלִים֮ <WH4026> and towers דְּלָתַ֣יִם <WH1817> gates וּבְרִיחִים֒ <WH1280> and bars עוֹדֶ֨נּוּ <WH5750> is still הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> [while] the land לְפָנֵ֗ינוּ <WH6440> [is] yet before כִּ֤י <WH3588> because דָרַ֙שְׁנוּ֙ <WH1875> us because we have sought אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> our God דָּרַ֕שְׁנוּ <WH1875> we have sought וַיָּ֥נַֽח <WH5117> [him] and he hath given us rest לָ֖נוּ מִסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> on every side וַיִּבְנ֖וּ <WH1129> So they built וַיַּצְלִֽיחוּ׃ <WH6743> and prospered פ

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become לְאָסָ֗א <WH609> And Asa חַיִל֮ <WH2428> had an army נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> [of men] that bare צִנָּ֣ה <WH6793> targets וָרֹמַח֒ <WH7420> and spears מִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> out of Judah שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> thousand ס וּמִבִּנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> and out of Benjamin נֹשְׂאֵ֤י <WH5375> that bare מָגֵן֙ <WH4043> shields וְדֹ֣רְכֵי <WH1869> and drew קֶ֔שֶׁת <WH7198> bows מָאתַ֥יִם <WH3967> two hundred וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> and fourscore אָ֑לֶף <WH505> thousand כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> another גִּבּ֥וֹרֵי <WH1368> all these [were] mighty men חָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> of valour

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> And there came out אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH413> against זֶ֣רַח <WH2226> against them Zerah הַכּוּשִׁ֗י <WH3569> the Ethiopian בְּחַ֙יִל֙ <WH2428> with an host אֶ֣לֶף <WH505> of a thousand אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> thousand וּמַרְכָּב֖וֹת <WH4818> chariots שְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> against מָרֵשָֽׁה׃ <WH4762> unto Mareshah

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went out אָסָ֖א <WH609> Then Asa לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> against וַיַּֽעַרְכוּ֙ <WH6186> in array מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> him and they set the battle בְּגֵ֥יא <WH1516> in the valley צְפַ֖תָה <WH6859> of Zephathah לְמָרֵשָֽׁה׃ <WH4762> at Mareshah

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> cried אָסָ֜א <WH609> And Asa אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֮ <WH430> his God וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> and said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> LORD אֵֽין־ <WH369> there עִמְּךָ֤ <WH5973> besides לַעְזוֹר֙ <WH5826> [it is] nothing with thee to help בֵּ֥ין <WH996> whether רַב֙ <WH7227> with many לְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no כֹּ֔חַ <WH3581> or with them that have no power עָזְרֵ֜נוּ <WH5826> help יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> us O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> our God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> against נִשְׁעַ֔נּוּ <WH8172> for we rest וּבְשִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> on thee and in thy name בָ֔אנוּ <WH935> we go עַל־ <WH5921> against הֶהָמ֖וֹן <WH1995> against this multitude הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH430> thou [art] our God אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you אַל־ <WH408> nay יַעְצֹ֥ר <WH6113> prevail עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> against אֱנֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH582> let not man ס

וַיִּגֹּ֤ף <WH5062> smote יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God אֶת־ <WH853> הַכּוּשִׁ֔ים <WH3569> the Ethiopians לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אָסָ֖א <WH609> Asa וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> and before יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> Judah וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <WH5127> fled הַכּוּשִֽׁים׃ <WH3569> and the Ethiopians

וַיִּרְדְּפֵ֨ם <WH7291> that [were] with him pursued אָסָ֜א <WH609> And Asa וְהָעָ֣ם <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עִמּוֹ֮ <WH5973> as עַד־ <WH5704> far לִגְרָר֒ <WH1642> them unto Gerar וַיִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> were overthrown מִכּוּשִׁים֙ <WH3569> and the Ethiopians לְאֵ֣ין <WH369> else לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> like מִֽחְיָ֔ה <WH4241> that they could not recover כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נִשְׁבְּר֥וּ <WH7665> themselves for they were destroyed לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> and before מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <WH4264> his host וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> and they carried away שָׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> spoil הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> much מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> very

וַיַּכּ֗וּ <WH5221> And they smote אֵ֤ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֶֽעָרִים֙ <WH5892> all the cities סְבִיב֣וֹת <WH5439> round about גְּרָ֔ר <WH1642> Gerar כִּי־ <WH3588> for הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> had fallen פַֽחַד־ <WH6343> for the fear יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> on וַיָּבֹ֙זּוּ֙ <WH962> came upon them and they spoiled אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> all the cities כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בִזָּ֥ה <WH961> spoil רַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> for there was exceeding much הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> had fallen בָהֶֽם׃

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אָהֳלֵ֥י <WH168> also the tents מִקְנֶ֖ה <WH4735> of cattle הִכּ֑וּ <WH5221> They smote וַיִּשְׁבּ֨וּ <WH7617> and carried away צֹ֤אן <WH6629> sheep לָרֹב֙ <WH7230> in abundance וּגְמַלִּ֔ים <WH1581> and camels וַיָּשֻׁ֖בוּ <WH7725> and returned יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem ס
